algorithm_technique: Simulate the game process, tracking the current winner and their consecutive wins.
problem_summary_simple: Find the player who wins k consecutive games in a competition.
problem_summary_technical: Simulate the queue-based competition, updating the winner and their streak based on skill comparisons.
key_insights: The player with the highest skill will eventually reach the front and stay there if k is large enough.
We only need to track the current 'champion' and their consecutive wins.
The simulation can stop as soon as a player achieves k consecutive wins.
